summary: REQ-51 is implemented by adding non-empty `videoUrl` values for the four specified existing lessons in `frontend/src/content/videoLessons.ts`, using YouTube links. However, the diff also changes the remaining lessons by explicitly setting `videoUrl: undefined` with placeholder comments, and includes unrelated modifications to summary/state files that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Explicitly setting `videoUrl: undefined` (with placeholder comments) for the remaining lessons (`content-planning-youtube`, `tiktok-trends`), which may be a content change rather than leaving them unchanged.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest states to keep the remaining lessons unchanged (their `videoUrl` may remain undefined). The diff explicitly adds/sets `videoUrl: undefined` plus placeholder comments, which could be considered an unrequested modification if those fields were previously omitted.

hallucinated_features.description: Unrequested updates to repository metadata/summary files.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-51 only requests updating `frontend/src/content/videoLessons.ts`. The diff summary indicates additional modified files not mentioned in the BuildRequest.
